timeline.bodyText: should this rather be reset on negotiation? because imagine the case where you lost the lock for a short period or even a long period but writes did not progress, so your lastProcessSequence is still valid as you can continue from that point onwards?
timeline.author: annym

replies.bodyText: Do you mean lost the lock for a short period and there is no negotiation during this period? So we don't need to reset in this case.
replies.author: zhangn49

replies.bodyText: I see your point. Active won't know remote leader loss if there is no write... Moved it to negotiation
replies.author: zhangn49

timeline.bodyText: do we also need to print the number of remainingEntries?
timeline.author: pankti-m

replies.bodyText: I think number of remainingEntries is fine, because the consumer will only check it is 0 or not.
